rooms.description: North-facing entrance with reception area, incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Open-plan living space adjoining the kitchen and dining area, designed in a Scandinavian minimalist style with ample natural light.
Functional open-plan kitchen integrated with living space. Features modern appliances and built-in storage, aligning with both Scandinavian design and Vastu guidelines.
Master bedroom with a private balcony, designed as the primary bachelor pad space; incorporates open space for relaxation and work.
Secondary bedroom featuring a spacious balcony and storage areas, maintaining Scandinavian aesthetics and adherence to Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom designed for versatile use with dedicated balcony space, ensuring natural light and privacy in accordance with local norms.
Fourth bedroom with a balcony; ideal for guests or multifunctional purposes, following Scandinavian minimalistic design.
Fifth and final bedroom, featuring a compact yet functional design with a balcony, ensuring consistency in design language across all rooms.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door for optimal positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Each bedroom features an external opening for balconies, ensuring adequate natural light and ventilation.
Strategically placed windows to maximize daylight and maintain indoor air quality in line with Scandinavian design standards.
